questions.question: He was not a popular guy. He had very ........................... friends.
questions.description: Few means almost none. It can be used with very.

questions.question: I have met him only ........................... times.
questions.description: A few indicates a small number.

questions.question: We have ............................. money. We can't eat out tonight.
There are ............................ apples in the fridge if you are hungry.
questions.description: A few indicates a small number.

questions.question: There was ............................. oil in the tank. It was almost empty.
questions.description: Little oil means almost no oil.

questions.question: He has .......................... patience.
questions.description: Little patience means almost no patience.

questions.question: I have got ............................ money so you can buy that shirt if you want.
questions.description: A little indicates a small amount.

questions.question: Only ................................ politicians are honest.
questions.description: Only a few means the same as few.

questions.question: He ate ................................ food and then went to bed.
.......................... people can afford a cruise holiday. It is very expensive.
questions.description: Only a few means the same as few.

questions.question: There are very ............................... people that I really respect.
